content: work 1 double_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 3 turn row 4 work 1 double_crochet in each double_crochet across at end of the row chain 1 turn row 5 work 3 single_crochet in each double_crochet chain 1 turn row 6 change to coral pink with coral pink chain 3 skip next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat across the row chain 1 turn row 7 chain 3 single_crochet in the next chain 3 space repeat across the row end off for headband with size f hook chain 40 then work 1 single_crochet in each chain end off finishing weave in all ends attach a button or tiny strips of velcro to back of dress sew on a ribbon rose or trim if desired c connie j pritchett march 2019 set # 19 chelsea doll dress gold and white 8/11 single_crochet single_crochet hook size f and size 2 1/2 matching thread and needle tapestry needle small button or velcro ribbon rose opt gauge 4 stitches = 1 inch 4 row = 1 inch top of dress row 1 staring with gold and with size f crochet hook chain 15 work 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and each chain chain 1 turn row 2 work 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet chain 1 turn ---- 14 single_crochet 9/11 row 3 work 1 single_crochet in the next 3 single_crochet then chain 3 skip the next single_crochet work 1 single_crochet in the next single_crochet then work 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet work 1 single_crochet in the next single_crochet then chain 3 skip the next single_crochet then work 1 single_crochet in the next single_crochet work 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet chain 1 turn row 4 with size 2 1/2 crochet hook work 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet and chain across end off skirt row 1 with size f crochet hook attach yarn to bottom of top on right side chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 1 turn for two colors in the dress change colors on the next row row 2 work 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 3 turn row 3 work 1 double_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 3 turn row 4 work 1 double_crochet in each double_crochet across at end of the row chain 1 turn for two colors change colors again on these last 2 row row 5 work 2 single_crochet in each double_crochet across at the end of the row chain 1 turn row 6 * chain 3 skip next single_crochet single_crochet in the next
